about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through the sprawling medieval realm of Eldwyrm in this immersive open-world RPG.

Explore a Vast Open World
Roam freely across a beautifully crafted landscape, from ancient ruins and lush forests to bustling villages.

Engaging Quests and Dynamic NPCs
Embark on epic quests that will take you to the farthest reaches of the realm. Interact with a colorful cast of characters, each with their own stories, motivations, and secrets. Your interactions with these NPCs can lead to unexpected alliances, rivalries, and outcomes that shape the narrative.

Gameplay Features
- Branching storylines: choose your path and influence the world around you.
- Combat system: blending strategy with real-time action.
- Crafting: gather resources and craft your own gear and potions.

Please note that while there is no explicit depiction of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, some themes and discussions may be sensitive for certain players. We recommend player discretion.

content_descriptors.notes:
Eldoria includes strategic combat and references to alcoholic beverages. 

The narrative delves into complex themes such as betrayal, sacrifice, and darker aspects of human nature, which are handled with sensitivity. While the game includes romantic encounters, these are depicted with moderation. 

It's important to note that the game addresses issues like drug/alcohol use, without any explicit depiction of sexual assault or non-consensual sex. Player discretion is advised for these mature themes.
